items.title: Complex Endodontic Procedures
items.description: I specialise in complex endodontic procedures, including root canal treatments and retreatement.

items.title: Advanced Restorative Techniques
items.description: I specialise in advanced restorative techniques, including dental implants and full mouth rehabilitation.

items.title: Minimally Invasive Dental Treatments
items.description: I specialise in minimally invasive dentistry, including tooth-saving techniques and conservative restorative options.
